Row.Text: [COLOR_CYAN]* National Wonder (each player may build one)[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Must have built a Hotel in all Cities. The cost goes up the more cities there are in the empire. 100% of the [ICON_CULTURE] Culture from World Wonders, Natural Wonders, and Improvements (Landmarks, Moai, Chateau) is added to the [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism output of the city. [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism output from Great Works +100%.
